successes.title: Edyn: Welcome to the connected garden.
successes.description: Edyn is a smart garden system that monitors and tracks environmental conditions, helping you help your plants thrive.

Pledges.description: Help us grow the Edyn community. Become an official Edyn backer and RECEIVE A THANK YOU note from our founder, Jason. Plus you’ll get behind-the-scenes updates on our journey.
Spread the word about the connected garden with a rad Edyn STICKER.
Share your love of Edyn with an official Edyn T-SHIRT. We’re making a special run just for this campaign.
ONE GARDEN SENSOR: we’re offering up a special deal for the early birds. Hop on it fast to get this special rate.
ONE GARDEN SENSOR: our official Kickstarter rate for the Edyn Garden Sensor, the hub of the system. This price is special for our Kickstarter backers and will go up when we hit retail shelves.
Look good while you garden. Receive ONE GARDEN SENSOR + ONE EDYN T-SHIRT that we’re making special just for this campaign.

Be a BETA TESTER. Be a founding member of the Edyn community by receiving one of the first Garden Sensors to roll off of the production line. You’ll have the opportunity to give us feedback and help shape the future of Edyn.
Reach Edyn. Get the complete smart garden system with ONE GARDEN SENSOR + ONE WATER VALVE.

BUY ONE, GIVE ONE. Help us share Edyn with schools so kids can grow better, healthier food. For every Edyn Garden Sensor you buy for yourself, we’ll donate one sensor to a school in the U.S. through the organization Slow Food USA.

Pair together TWO GARDEN SENSORS for a more detailed Edyn experience. If you’ve got a large plot of land or want to get really tailored information for specific plant types, you can connect multiple Garden Sensors to your Edyn App.
Pair together TWO GARDEN SENSORS and add ONE WATER VALVE to complete your smart garden system. Get tailored information for specific plant types or areas of your garden and enable automatic watering.
Go big. Get THREE GARDEN SENSORS to meet the specific needs of your land.
The ultimate Edyn bundle. Get THREE GARDEN SENSORS plus TWO WATER VALVES. Make your garden thrive.
For the slow food lover. Join our founder, Jason, for lunch at famed Bay Area restaurant Chez Panisse. Plus you’ll get the complete smart garden system with one Edyn Garden Sensor and Water Valve.
